## ðŸ“¦ Installation

### Using as Template

```bash
npx degit victorbruce/angular-starter-project my-project
cd my-project
./setup.sh my-project
docker-compose up
```

### Clone Repository

```bash
git clone https://github.com/victorbruce/angular-starter-project.git
cd angular-starter-project
docker-compose up
```
